rows.label: tev031601_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Aganeba about Candid & Credible's weapons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031601_MSG0001
rows.name:
Authentic Candid & Credible weaponry hits its target
like a bolt from the blue, doesn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031601_MSG0002
rows.name:
Our weapons are pretty much perfect if you need to fry
fishy indigens like lophids or a gaggle of Ganglion
puges. They do whopping damage, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031601_MSG0003
rows.name:
Though I imagine you're probably better off tackling
bug-like indigens such as the forfex with attacks of
either fire or ether?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031601_MSG0004
rows.name:
But all the same, you you really should use C&C
weapons if possible. You haven't lived until you've
shocked a forfex into oblivion, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031601_MSG0008
rows.name:
Well, I sort of leave the actual production to my
associates? I prefer the easy job, which is to stand here
and spout technology to interested parties...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031601_MSG0009
rows.name:
Did I mention that Matthew pays me in scrumptious
pizza if I do a really good job?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031601_MSG0010
rows.name:
And that I get an extra pie if I feign reluctance at
giving away all our secrets? Which is why I'm not
going to to to say another word![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031601_MSG0011
rows.name:
He's kind of like my own personal pizza dispenser,
you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031601_MSG0012
rows.name:
He'd probably be mad if he heard me say that, huh?
Maybe I should manage this symbiotic relationship
a little more carefully?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031601_MSG0013
rows.name:
Mira is home to an indigen with large pincers called
the "forfex," you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031601_MSG0014
rows.name:
It expels ether foam from its mouth and has armor that
can repel bullets, which makes it a particularly nasty
foe, I suppose?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031601_MSG0015
rows.name:
But if you can destroy its head, I think you can salvage
a delicious little something known as forfex miso?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031601_MSG0016
rows.name:
I'm really fascinated with forfexes, aren't I?
I wonder why that is?[ST:wait ]
